title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials and is redirected to their feed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the personalized feed page
Ensure authentication tokens are properly stored in Zustand store

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login with invalid credentials is rejected and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username/email and/or password
Click the login button
Verify login fails and error notification/toast is displayed
Verify user remains on login page and no authentication token is stored

title: Signup Workflow Success
description: Verify a new user can successfully sign up, receives email verification step, and is authenticated upon verification.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Enter valid new user details including email, username, and password
Submit signup form
Verify signup confirmation prompt for email verification is shown
Simulate email verification link click
Verify user account is activated and user is redirected appropriately
Verify authentication state is updated in Zustand store

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify that password recovery can be initiated and completed with reset email and password update.

steps.description: Navigate to password recovery page
Enter registered email address
Submit password recovery request
Verify password reset email is sent notification is displayed
Follow password reset link and enter new password
Submit new password
Verify password is updated and user can log in with new credentials

title: Feed Post Card: Display Post with Media
description: Verify that posts with various media types (images, video, GIFs) display correctly on Feed Post Card component.

steps.description: Load personalized feed with posts containing images, videos, and GIFs
Ensure all media assets are loaded and rendered with correct layout and controls
Verify media playback controls function: play, pause, mute, unmute
Confirm media status indicators (e.g., playing, paused) are visible

title: Feed Post Card: Like and Unlike Post
description: Validate liking and unliking a post updates UI instantly and synchronization with backend happens correctly.

steps.description: On a post in Feed Post Card, click like button
Verify like count increments immediately and button reflects liked state
Click like button again to unlike
Verify like count decrements immediately and button reflects unliked state
Simulate backend failure and ensure optimistic UI reverts and error notification is shown

title: Feed Post Card: Comment Posting and Replying
description: Verify that users can post new comments, reply to comments, and UI updates accordingly with rich text editor.

steps.description: Open comments panel on a post
Input a new comment using the TipTap rich text editor with text and inline formatting
Submit comment
Verify new comment appears immediately in the comments list
Click reply on an existing comment
Input reply comment with rich text editor
Submit reply
Verify reply comment is nested under the original comment and rendered with formatting
Try submitting empty comment
Verify validation error message is displayed and comment is not accepted

title: Feed Post Card: Like and Unlike Comments
description: Validate liking and unliking comments in the comment thread with instant UI updates and error handling.

steps.description: Open comments panel on a post
Like a comment
Verify comment like count increments and button state updates instantly
Unlike the comment
Verify comment like count decrements and button state updates instantly
Simulate backend failure and verify optimistic UI rollback with error notification

title: Post Creation: Text and Media Upload
description: Verify the Create Post modal allows posting text content with rich formatting and uploading media files.

steps.description: Open Create Post modal
Enter post text in rich text editor with multiple formats (bold, italic, links)
Upload supported media files (images, videos)
Verify preview of text and media displays correctly in the modal
Submit the post
Verify post appears instantly in the feed and media is correctly rendered
Attempt to upload unsupported file format
Verify upload is rejected with proper validation message

title: Post Editing and Deletion via Modal
description: Test editing and deleting an existing post using modals, with UI updates and cache invalidation.

steps.description: Open edit post modal from a postâ€™s action menu
Modify the post content including text and media
Submit post update
Verify updated post content appears on the feed immediately
Open delete post modal and confirm deletion
Verify post is removed from the feed instantly and caches are invalidated
Verify UI displays success or error notifications based on API results

title: Follow and Unfollow User with Optimistic Update
description: Verify that follow and unfollow actions on profile header perform optimistic UI updates with proper rollback on failure.

steps.description: Navigate to a user profile page
Click follow button on profile header
Verify follow button state changes immediately and follower count increments
Simulate backend failure response
Verify follow button state reverts and error toast notification is shown
Click unfollow button
Verify unfollow button state changes immediately and follower count decrements
Simulate backend failure
Verify UI reverts and error is notified

title: Profile Tabs Navigation and Content Display
description: Verify user can successfully navigate profile tabs (posts, likes, etc) and content updates accordingly.

steps.description: Open a user profile page
Click on 'Posts' tab
Verify posts are displayed correctly
Click on 'Likes' tab
Verify liked posts content is displayed correctly
Click other profile tabs
Verify corresponding content is fetched and rendered without errors

title: Explore and Discover Pages with Pagination and Infinite Scroll
description: Verify explore and discover pages load content accurately, handle pagination and infinite scrolling seamlessly.

steps.description: Navigate to Explore page
Verify initial set of content is loaded and displayed correctly
Scroll down to trigger infinite loading
Verify new content batches load smoothly and appended to the list
Navigate to Discover page and test tag and profile navigation
Verify filtered content loads and updates on selecting tags or profiles

title: Static Marketing Pages Load and Navigation
description: Verify that marketing and static content pages load correctly, display expected content, and all links work properly.

steps.description: Navigate to pricing, blog, roadmap, terms, privacy, and other marketing pages
Verify page content is rendered as per design and data
Verify all internal and external links open successfully and navigation is seamless
Test page responsiveness on various screen sizes
Verify correct UI scaling and element positioning

title: Authentication Route Guards and Redirects
description: Verify protected routes are guarded for authenticated users and redirections are correct after login, logout, signup.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected feed page without authentication
Verify redirect to login page
Login successfully
Verify redirect to originally requested protected page
Logout from the application
Verify user is logged out, Zustand store cleared, and redirected to login or home page

title: Feed Sidebar Navigation and User Suggestions
description: Verify sidebar navigation links and user suggestion components function properly and support interaction.

steps.description: Load feed page and locate sidebar component
Verify navigation links are correct and clickable
Verify user suggestions list displays with correct user info
Click follow/unfollow button on user suggestion
Verify optimistic UI updates with proper error handling on failure

title: Post Like List Modal Display
description: Verify that opening the likes modal for a post displays accurate list of users who liked the post.

steps.description: Click to open likes modal on a post
Verify modal opens and displays a scrollable list of users who liked the post with profile information
Verify modal can be closed correctly without affecting underlying feed

title: Toast Notification Display and Behavior
description: Verify toast notifications appear correctly after relevant user actions (errors, success) and auto-dismiss properly.

steps.description: Trigger an action causing success notification (e.g., post creation)
Verify toast notification is displayed with correct message
Trigger an action causing error notification (e.g., failed follow request)
Verify error toast notification is displayed
Verify toast notifications auto-dismiss after timeout

title: API Client Integration with Axios
description: Verify API client wrapper correctly handles backend API calls with success, error, and timeout scenarios.

steps.description: Perform standard API calls for getting posts, creating posts, authenticating, following users
Verify responses are handled correctly and data populates UI
Simulate API timeout and server error responses
Verify error handling mechanisms trigger appropriate UI feedback

title: End-to-End Critical Path Test: Login, Feed Interaction, Profile Navigation
description: Run an automated end-to-end test covering logging in, interacting with feed posts (like, comment), and navigating to a user profile.

steps.description: Automate navigation to login page and successful login
Like a post and verify UI updates instantly
Post a comment on the liked post
Navigate to a user profile from the feed
Verify profile header and tabs load correctly with accurate content
